ValidationRule.description: Return Reason Category and Return Reasons cannot be deleted once they are set
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), OR( AND(ISCHANGED( Project_Training_Issue_Reason__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Project_Training_Issue_Reason__c))),ISBLANK(TEXT(Project_Training_Issue_Reason__c))), AND(ISCHANGED( Return_Reasons__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( Return_Reasons__c ))),ISBLANK(TEXT( Return_Reasons__c )))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Return Reason Category and Return Reasons cannot be deleted once they are set
